prompt.content: Using FY2024 10-K filings, calculate Palantir's (NASDAQ: PLTR) Enterprise Value/EBITDA using the close price of the 18th November 2025. Do not use adjusted EBITDA. Round your answer to 2 decimal points. Show your calculations, formulas and assumptions.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Used GAAP EBITDA and did not use adjusted EBITDA","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Compute EBITDA = Income from operations + Depreciation & amortization = $310,403,000 + $31,587,000 = $341,990,000","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Use EV formula: EV = Equity value (using the close price on 2025-11-18 × total common shares outstanding) + Total debt + Non-controlling interests + Preferred equity − Cash & cash equivalents − Marketable securities","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"There is no preferred equity","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Operating lease liabilities excluded from debt"},{"criteria":"Subtract both cash & cash equivalents and marketable securities as proxy for excess cash","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Shares outstanding as of 2025-02-10 = 2,248,950,826 (Class A) + 95,400,680 (Class B) + 1,005,000 (Class F) = 2,345,356,506","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Total debt at 2024-12-31 = $0","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Cash & cash equivalents at 2024/12/31 = $2,098,524,000","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Marketable securities at 2024/12/31 = $3,131,463,000"},{"criteria":"Non-controlling interests at 2024/12/31 = $91,132,000","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Use closing price of the stock on 2025-11-18 = $167.33 per share","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Equity value = $167.33 × 2,345,356,506 = $392,448,504,148.98 ","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Enterprise Value = $392,448,504,148.98 + $0 + $91,132,000 − $2,098,524,000 − $3,131,463,000 = $387,309,649,148.98 ","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"EV/EBITDA = $387,309,649,148.98 ÷ $341,990,000 = 1,132.52× ","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Used FY2024 Form 10-K as source for the following financial statement inputs (income from operations, depreciation & amortization, cash, marketable securities, non-controlling interests, shares outstanding, debt)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Round EV/EBITDA to two decimals, 1,132.52x"}]
